column4: tannerS Ubuntu 8.04 is a long term release from a year ago and 9.04 is a new six month release
Tanners 8.04 strives for stability as a long-term release, my buddy uses it for gaming because he doesn't want to break his configureations
Yea go 9.04, and if you feel adventurous go 9.10 its in its forth alpha release and I am on it now
